medical_history.chief_complaint: Anaphylactic reaction after administration of Y-90 ibritumomab tiuxetan.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient experienced anaphylaxis within seconds of receiving the therapeutic dose of Y-90 ibritumomab tiuxetan. Symptoms included chest tightness, shallow respirations, hypotension (75/40 mm Hg), tachycardia, and urinary incontinence.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Extensive treatment for relapsing follicular non-Hodgkin lymphoma; history of multiple chemotherapy regimens and an autologous peripheral blood stem cell transplant.
